mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM remittance WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()) as dailyRemittanceCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM remittance WHERE DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m')) as monthlyRemittanceCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM remittance WHERE DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y')) as yearlyRemittanceCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user) as totalUserCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)) as newUserCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qna WHERE status = 'PENDING') as pendingQnaCount
SELECT COUNT(*) as totalCount, AVG(amount) as averageAmount, MAX(amount) as maxAmount, SUM(amount) as totalAmount FROM remittance WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()

SELECT COUNT(*) as totalUsers, COUNT(CASE WHEN created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) THEN 1 END) as newUsers, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 1 END) as activeUsers, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'INACTIVE' THEN 1 END) as inactiveUsers FROM user
SELECT COUNT(*) as totalCountries, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_available = true THEN 1 END) as availableCountries, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_favorite_currency) as totalFavorites FROM country
SELECT COUNT(*) as totalCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'PENDING' THEN 1 END) as pendingCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'ANSWERED' THEN 1 END) as answeredCount FROM qna
